description: This file defines the 'AppTheme' class, which provides a theme configuration for a Flutter application named 'Ocean Professional'. It specifies color schemes, text themes, and widget styles to create a consistent visual appearance across the app.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing themed styles and color schemes for the Flutter application, facilitating consistent theming for light mode layouts.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with the 'Ocean Professional' color scheme and styles suitable for light mode.
